CustomField.formula: CASE( MOD(IF(ISBLANK(FACT_Time_of_GC_Complete__c),TODAY(),datevalue(FACT_Time_of_GC_Complete__c)) - datevalue(FACT_Time_of_Escalation__c),7), 0, CASE(MOD( datevalue(FACT_Time_of_Escalation__c)- DATE(1985,6,24),7),0,1,1,1,2,1,3,1,4,1,5,0,6,0,1), 1, CASE(MOD( datevalue(FACT_Time_of_Escalation__c)- DATE(1985,6,24),7),0,2,1,2,2,2,3,2,4,1,5,0,6,1,1), 2, CASE(MOD( datevalue(FACT_Time_of_Escalation__c)- DATE(1985,6,24),7),0,3,1,3,2,3,3,2,4,1,5,1,6,2,1), 3, CASE(MOD( datevalue(FACT_Time_of_Escalation__c)- DATE(1985,6,24),7),0,4,1,4,2,3,3,2,4,2,5,2,6,3,1), 4, CASE(MOD( datevalue(FACT_Time_of_Escalation__c)- DATE(1985,6,24),7),0,5,1,4,2,3,3,3,4,3,5,3,6,4,1), 5, CASE(MOD( datevalue(FACT_Time_of_Escalation__c)- DATE(1985,6,24),7),0,5,1,4,2,4,3,4,4,4,5,4,6,5,1), 6, CASE(MOD( datevalue(FACT_Time_of_Escalation__c)- DATE(1985,6,24),7),0,5,1,5,2,5,3,5,4,5,5,5,6,5,1), 999) + (FLOOR((IF(ISBLANK(FACT_Time_of_GC_Complete__c),TODAY(),datevalue(FACT_Time_of_GC_Complete__c))- datevalue( FACT_Time_of_Escalation__c))/7)*5)
CustomField.label: GC Case Age (Days)
